full_summary:
### Tender Announcement
#### Expert Advice and Analysis on Appropriate Use Program and Policy Interventions
==========================

**Contracting Entity:** Health Canada
------------------------------

**Notice Type:** Advance Contract Award Notice
--------------------------------------------

**Procurement Category:** SRV
---------------------------

**Trade Agreements:**

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

**Locations:**

* Canada
* National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contract Award:** The tender for expert advice and analysis on appropriate use program and policy interventions has been awarded.

**Description:**
The Canadian Drug Agency Transition Office has taken an engagement-informed approach to understand and analyze the issues, concerns, and opportunities facing Canada’s pharmaceutical management system. In consideration of this feedback, CDATO is advancing initial work to support development of core functions proposed for the CDA, including the appropriate use of prescription medications. The Contractor will conduct independent analysis of program and policy best practices, interviews with provinces and territories, and a review of barriers and facilitators for implementation. The Contractor will also provide recommendations for the design of a decision tool to support decision makers in selecting appropriate use interventions relevant to their context and drug class.

**Required Staff and Expertise:**
The Contractor must have expertise in program and policy analysis and the ability to conduct interviews with stakeholders. The Contractor will also be required to review and contribute to draft products prepared by CDATO.

**Submission Requirements:**
Tenders must be submitted in both English and French.

**Closing Date:** This tender opportunity is no longer active.

**Attachment:**
A PDF copy of the tender notice is available for download at the following link:
[https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4444/pr1000247954-acan-final-%28english.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4444/pr1000247954-acan-final-%28english.pdf)

**Contact Information:**
Wesley Phillips
[pleasant.problems@hc-sc.gc.ca](mailto:wesley.phillips@hc-sc.gc.ca)
(613) 941-2067
[Health Canada](http://healthycanadians.gc.ca/)
